title: Guess these fonts and WIN!
content:
You actually won’t win anything. That was just a ploy. I still could use some help figuring out the fonts used in this logo though.

Thanks for the help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612042916im_/http:/typophile.com/files/thorphouse_6051.gif)

 [‹ Grotesque ID please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612042916/http:/typophile.com/node/46246 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Passers-by" game font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612042916/http:/typophile.com/node/46245 "Go to next forum topic")
author: daxpd28

comments.content: Oops. sorry that image is so large.

Thorp house is written in Oberon

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/oberon/plain/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612042916/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/oberon/plain/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/oberon/plain/")
those will do. perfect. thanks guys.
